page.title: 19TOURISM,HORNBY.
page.content: Mill House is a historic farmhouse.It has bed and breakfast accommodation.It is open from Easter until October,but sometimes Mrs. Knox(the owner) doesn't open it all the time.The charges vary according to the guests.There are two double bedrooms.It is difficult to say how many guests stay per year.Most people come again and again.These are mostly friends.Couples enjoy the peace as no children under ten are taken. As Hornby is in the "Herriott Country" many tourists drive through the area or walk the rural footpaths. St.Mary's Church also attracts visitors as it has a unique Norman carved archway.
